channel.title: Projects on Kartik Rawool
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kartik Rawool

item.title: Database Management System - Wolf Media
item.description: Database management system for music streaming service

item.title: Image Segmentation - Brain Tumor Segmentation of MRI images
item.description: Developed a Neural Network to segment Brain tumors in MRI images

item.title: Time Series - Terrain Identification from Time Series Data
item.description: Developed a model to detect Terrain from the IMU data from prosthetics.

item.title: Software Development - Online Book-shopping System
item.description: Developed a CRUD application using Ruby on Rails

item.title: Web Scraping and Web Development - Job Cruncher - Online Job Scraping and Analysis Tool
item.description: Developed a Web application to help job seekers compare different job listings based on several factors

item.title: Computer Vision - Intelligent Video Surveillance System for Real-time Crowd Analysis
item.description: Developed a application for social distance detection, anomaly detection and video summarization of CCTV footage

item.title: Natural Language Processing - Sentiment Analysis of COVID-19 Tweets
item.description: Trained a Machine Learning model to detect sentiment of tweets related to Covid-19.

item.title: Data Visualization Dashboard - Air Quality Visualization
item.description: Created a multilayered visualization dashboard using PowerBI for capturing information from different wards.

item.title: Web Development and Machine Learning - Wound Detection and Universal ID
item.description: Developed a web app using Django which classified a wound image as severe or non-severe, and upon detection, prompted the user with a relevant action.

item.title: Recommendation System - Movie Recommendation System using R
item.description: Created a recommendation system based on user based collaborative filtering

item.title: Regression Analysis - Flight Ticket Price Prediction
item.description: Trained a Machine Learning model to predict the price of flight ticket
